metadata.description:
THIS MOD IS WORKING IN PROGRESS PLEASE SUBMIT ANY ISSUE THIS IS MOSTLY SKELETON FOR FUTURE UPDATES
[h1]Coop HUD[/h1]
I've been tired of playing Isaac in coop with vanilla broken hud so I've created a new one. This mod is my try to render proper HUD for game. It renders only HUD so I'm sugesting using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1978904635] MiniMAPI[/url] (for map) and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2635267643]Enhanced Boss Bars[/url] For right now this mod do not show stats [h2]Features[/h2] [list] [*] Renders HUD with proper positioning - no weird sprites for coop player [*] Customizable hud positions (*) [*] Suport modded pockets items/ [*] Bethany charges/ colored charge bar [*] Display names for pockets [*] Vanilla like prompts (using cards/ pills/ activeitems) (*) [list] [h3]Tainted Characters[/h3] [*] Poop spells integration for Tainted ??? (*) [*] Bag of crafting integration (*) [*] Pulsing T.Maggy Heart [/list] [/list] (*) - future releases [h2]Issues/ not working/missing[/h2] [*] Jacob and Essau - won't render properly - WIP [*] Forgotten - won't render properly - WIP [*] Urn of soul - only show open/close sprite state - no modding API function [*] Jar of Wisp - manual charge detection/ resets on restart- no modding API function
